item.description:
Come join us for a pot luck/ bonfire Samhain party!

We will start out with a POT LUCK dinner, from 5:00- 6:30 pm

(details to be sent to the list!)

There will be (3) contests with great Pagan prizes in each category:

- A pumpkin carving contest (you may bring your pumpkins home)
(2) Prizes one child; one adult

- Best pagan costume contest
(2) Prizes: one child; one adult

- Halloween Trivia Contest (Adult Prize only for most answers)

We will then head down, for a huge bonfire, for a talk about upcoming Samhain,

have an open pagan chat, about ghostly experiences, near-death experiences, and life after death.

We will also roast marshmallows, make smore's, and do some drumming and chanting-

Families are welcome-

Camping is also available
(please let me know ahead of time)

Donations to cover prizes, paper product and meet up cost will be appreciated :)

See you there!
item.name: Pre-Samhain Bonfire Party
